page.title: 06Recreation in Meltham
page.content: In a survey of Meltham school children between the age of 5 and 11 we found out that the most popular{hobby}was reading folowed by roller skating, cooking and dancing. The least popular{hobbies}were horse riding and chess. We also looked at the{clubs}the children belonged to.The most popular were cubs/brownies and scouts/guides and swimming{club,}followed by choir or music{club},football and dancing club. The least popular{clubs}were tennis and BMX{club}. There are several organisations in Meltham for adults. The main ones are a Gardeners club, a{club}for pensioners,a Civic Society and Womens Institute which each provide interesting talks and activities throughout the year for its members.
